headline.main: Report Prescribes Exercise, Less Fat; Report Prescribes Exercise, Less Fat

byline.original: By HAROLD M. SCHMECK Jr. Special to The New York Times

docs.abstract: Natl Sciences Acad rept on effect of fat in Amer diet on human health, particularly on heart and circulatory system, urges more emphasis on proper diet and proper exercise in view of evidence that atherosclerosis begins to develop early in life
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, July 10 No radical change in the American diet is warranted by the facts known about heart disease, according to a report to the National Academy of SciencesNational Research Council.
docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, July 10 No radical change in the American diet is warranted by the facts known about heart disease, according to a report to the National Academy of SciencesNational Research Council.
